data.title: eCampus
data.meta_description: OFTC will participate in a new platform called “eCampus" which allows students to enroll in online courses offered by any TCSG college.
data.text:
eCampus is a platform that allows students from across Georgia to enroll in online courses offered by any Technical College System of Georgia (TCSG) college, providing students access to programs that may not be available at their home college. Upon completion of this course, students will earn credit at their home college.

Students can see advisor for list of eCampus courses if needed.

Additional Resources

Student Resources

Faculty Resources (Note: Must be logged into the college network to access.)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ’s)

Are there admission requirements for using this particular learning platform?

eCampus is a delivery platform used by all TCSG Colleges. The admission or placement requirements are determined by your college for all programs.

Does it cost anything to use?

Standard tuition and fees cover the cost of eCampus.

How do I enroll in class?

Students enroll in a class using the college’s normal enrollment platform.

What technology do I have to have to use eCampus?

A device that connects to the internet and access to some form of web browser. Some courses may have more requirements such as software or other hardware.

If I don’t have access to the internet, can I still have access to this tool and its resources?

Yes. Colleges will provide access via local College internet on their campus and provide location information for Wi-Fi hotspots strategically placed within your community.

More About OFTC Programs

Interested in learning more about OFTC’s 140+ programs of study? Visit the Programs Page on our website, OFTC.edu, to view all programs offered at OFTC.

About OFTC
